Description: Body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black with part of a rosette in added white outline with added red centres; exterior: part of pendant roundel and trace of dotted rosette as filling ornament.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0417) (phase 2)
